Title: Repeals certain provisions relating to the authority of the board of directors of a franchised corporation
Summary: Repeals certain provisions relating to the authority of the board of directors of a franchised corporation.
LawSection: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and Breeding Law
LawCode: Rpld ยง207 sub 8, RWB L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the racing, pari-mutuel wagering and breeding law, in relation to repealing certain provisions relating to the authority of the board of directors of a franchised corporation
